channel.title: Server down
channel.description:
Ok, it's not just you. Yes, the MSCP server was taken down for an hour or so
AFAIK the attack was a ddos, but other methods may have been used. We then believe the server nulled for a while. Without naming names, I don't believe the user who attacked the servers was doing it for anything other than LULZ. I don't think he is a malicious user though. He did point out some security flaws within the MSCP server.
I take no sides on this attack.

item.title: Server down
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

The server was offline momentarily due to an attack, but it wasn’t anything major. It has now been resolved, and will continue to be in the future. If there is anything information about any attack that you’d like to put forward please forward me a PM. Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Server down
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

Christmas_tree:

Was just informing you. If you don’t give a shit, I’m not asking you to read the topic.

and if an administrator felt we needed to know, they would inform us. let them do their job and you keep posting stupid shit

sk8rdude461:

When I first saw this, I thought it was some noob that posted about their server issue in the wrong section, as I didn’t read the author. Lol.

same, but i came to find it was only dumber then expected

Read full topic

item.title: Server down
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

Lin:

Did this really require a topic? I was unable to access the site for like a half hour. Who cares?

this.

OP; this isn’t a private server, if it goes down for 30 seconds you dont have to make a topic to inform us to keep us from suiciding. we’ll be ok i promise.

[quote=“xxx123xxx, post:6, topic:480852”][quote author=Lin link=topic=599090.msg4211398#msg4211398 date=1359590219]
Did this really require a topic? I was unable to access the site for like a half hour. Who cares?
[/quote]
I care. lol.[/quote]

i’ll be ok anyways
